== Chazhoor (627822) ==

Chazhoor is a village in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 467 hectares and harbouring 1473 households with total population of 5827 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 2641 and female population is 3186. Scheduled Caste Population is 930 and Scheduled Tribes population is 5. Census Location Code of the village is 627822<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
